value.name: Police: Man shot 'indiscriminately' at people, cars before Las Vegas officer shot him
value.description: Las Vegas police say a man, identified as William Holt, was "shooting indiscriminately" at people and cars before an officer shot and killed him. The shooting happened on Tuesday night at an apartment complex near Fremont Street and Charleston Boulevard.
